item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

OK, thanks. mind helping me on these?

1. when you make a fire it is invisible, and i think it has to do with these to lines of code in the firemaking class [code]Objects fire = new Objects(2732,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 3); Objects fire2 = new Objects(2732,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 60);[/code] i have tried editing the numbers, commenting out lines and i cant fix it :/

2.How would i add vengeance gfx? I think this could be client sided but I am not sure, or what is the pi vengeance gfx id? if soul split came with it.

3.How can i make the prayer drain slower?

item.title: [pi] some command help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

no i have that command. ok when i type ::afk the character sits on the stool and says “im away”. he only says it once and he only sits on the stool for like 30 seconds. how would i make him sit on the stool for like 10 minutes or untill the player does ::back. and how would i make him say “im away” like every 30 seconds?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] some command help
item.dc:creator: @scapexscape scapexscape
item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("back")) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.startAnimation(find the standing still emote); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.forcedChat("I'm Back!"); c.updateRequired = true;

Hope this helps . try that. You will need to find the emote on your own unless someone posts it here.
but its the same principle. Its the same but different animation.

;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] some command help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

here is my ::afk command

[code] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“afk”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
c.startAnimation(1353);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.forcedChat(“I’m Away!”);
c.updateRequired = true;

		}[/code]

now how would i make that make the anim go on untill i do ::back and how would i make it force chat like every 30 seconds.

right now it does the emote sitting on a stool and says “im away” when you do the command and it stops doing the emote like after 30 seconds, and only says “im away” once.

any help would be greatly appriciated:)

Read full topic
